snippet: Ms. Holm was 25 in 1943 when she was cast as Ado Annie in “Oklahoma!,” and in 1947 her performance in “Gentleman’s Agreement” garnered her the Oscar for best supporting actress.
abstract: Celeste Holm, witty character actress of stage and screen, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Holm was 25 in 1943 when she was cast as Ado Annie in “Oklahoma!,” and in 1947 her performance in “Gentleman’s Agreement” garnered her the Oscar for best supporting actress.

headline.seo: Celeste Holm, Witty Character Actress, Dies at 95
headline.main: Celeste Holm, Witty Character Actress, Is Dead at 95
headline.print_headline: Celeste Holm, Witty Character Actress, Is Dead at 95
